ai-tha-ap256:0.3_0: The Elder Tissa related in the Flame Tree
ai-tha-ap256:1.3_0: you’re staying in the midst of that assembly.
ai-tha-ap256:1.4_0: were fully developed, said in the sāl tree grove.
ai-tha-ap256:2.1_0: I’m seeing the truths like that,
ai-tha-ap256:2.4_0: Having grabbed hold of a lake,
ai-tha-ap256:3.2_0: As a bird was worshipped by the flowers,
ai-tha-ap256:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap256:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Timba flowers.
